JobFullDesc: Facebook Reality Labs (FRL) is seeking an experienced Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) Manager to join our growing, fast paced R&D labs.  This position is based in Facebook Zurich, Switzerland, reporting to the EMEA Regional EHS Manager in Cork, Ireland. This role  partners with facilities, security, engineering, researchers and lab operations to ensure safe, environmentally sound, audit and emergency ready at any time. This position will work across multiple facilities, including Prague, Tel Aviv and partner sites throughout Central Europe. The EHS Manager is accountable for implementation and execution of site compliance, risk analysis, continuous improvement and managing incident investigation and corrective action.
